title: Le sens de l'humour - A Sense of Humour (2011)
description:
Le sens de l'humour - A Sense of Humour (2011)

Luc et Marco sont deux humoristes de second ordre. Un soir, pendant leur spectacle, ils choisissent Roger Gendron qu'ils ridiculisent au grand plaisir des spectateurs. En ÃƒÂ©change de leur libÃƒÂ©ration, ils lui proposent de lui enseigner l'art de la comÃƒÂ©die et de faire de lui "LA" vedette d'Anse-au-Pic.

Luc and Marco are two humorists who travel the second order small theaters in Quebec. Each evening, they choose a fathead Turkish they ridicule to the delight of spectators. At Anse-au-Pic, a small town along the Saguenay, they humiliate Roger Gendron, shy cook snack bar instead. Very bad choice because the cook is a madman! The next morning, the two wake up comic in a cage, to thank you Roger Gendron, determined to take revenge. In exchange for their release, they asked him to teach him the art of comedy, making him the star of Anse-au-Pic! Roger Gendron accepts
